Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.

The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

Think and wonder, wonder and think.

No kind action ever stops with itself. One kind action leads to another. Good example is followed.
A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
Poetry is written with tears, fiction with blood, and history with invisible ink.
Wrong turns are as important as right turns. More important, sometimes.
Don't let the noise of others opinions drown out your inner voice.
Give out what you most want to come back.

Help others and give something back.
Don't change your mind just because people are offended; change your mind if you're wrong.
A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.
It's easier to go down a hill than up it but the view is much better at the top.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
The soul is neither born, and nor does it die.
We win by helping each other win.
To escape from the world means that one's mind is not concerned with the opinions of the world.
Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
Change yourself - you are in control.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

Remember we're all in this alone.
Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.

Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.

Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.

Life is a long lesson in humility.
